context: Does anyone know if this will connect a GameCube to an HDTV?
response: If its the correct connector on back of gamecube yes. But its not HD amazing quality but better quality than the cable it originally came with.
I run the game on my windows 7 using a virtual machine that runs XP

context: Is this a download version or disc? i only have a usb port no dvd reader on my mac
response: Its a disc that's how mine came

context: Does this work with OS X Lion?
response: Yes, I can also confirm that it works with OSX Lion.  I didn't have to download USB Overdrive for it work.  It worked with nothing additional needing to be downloaded.  I used it with SNES9X emulator.

context: What is inside of here ?  And does the xbox live gold pass come includes as a kit ?
response: It does come, but has a price on the box that is cheaper than how much they are charging for this.  No one responded and tried to make it right.  Has keyboard, headset, MS Points, and the year of xbox live gold.

context: Hello! I can use it to play the Gran Turismo 6? Thanks for help.
response: My Dad is 96 years old and he uses his wheel daily for Gran Turismo 5 and 6. He loves his wheel !!!

context: Will this work with the SteelSeries Siberia v2s that have 2 3.5mm jacks(Output and Input)?
response: I use a StarTech.com Headset adapter for headsets with separate headphone / microphone plugs - 3.5mm 4 position to 2x 3 position 3.5mm M/F with my SteelSeries Siberia v2 Full-Size Gaming Headset (Orange) and it works great.

context: May I know if this is ENG ver?
response: If the question is: Is this is english version? Yes it is!

context: Will this work with my Astros A50s which have a 2.5mm jack?
response: I thought I needed this bought it and found out that with the mixer plugged into the xbox you don't even need the cord plugged into the controller.
For every controller I've purchased on Amazon - it does not come with the charger unless they list that in the description.

context: My step son just has a regular ds...i see something about wifi on this game, do you have to have a ds that connects to wifi??
response: Does this game support Download Play?

context: My step son just has a regular ds...i see something about wifi on this game, do you have to have a ds that connects to wifi??
response: No, you don't have to. The wifi is for extra downloads and for playing online using multiplayer. But it is fine just for just playing single player.  I hope that helped.  Thanks for the Question

context: Is there a way to adjust sensitivity of the aileron and elevator trim wheels?  They are incredibly over-sensitive on mine (with Gold X)
response: In the Main Menu You can adjust sensitivity. Also in Options menu you can change Device and Buttons.. Long Menu but worth Looking into for References.

context: do you have to use the remote and nunchuck? or can you plat this game just with the remote. no nunchuk
response: You need both. One to walk around the other to shoot and move through menu screens
no you can not you can only use these characters on 2.0 but not in main missions only in the playground

context: What do I need to purchase in order to charge the Gembonics portable charger?
response: Nothing. It comes with a mini USB cord. You just plug it in you computer to recharge it.
